title: Marshal Law
description: We're back to talk about the big news: the draft of Justice Alito's opinion in Dobbs, and the questions that surround it -- how and why this might have happened, what it means for the Court, and what the Court can do about it.
author: pod@dividedargument.com (Will Baude & Dan Epps)
